00035 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QMainWindow(parent, f){
00036         // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00037         libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00038 
00039         if (!libq4wine.load()){
00040             libq4wine.load();
00041         }
00042 
00043         // Getting corelib calss pointer
00044         CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00045     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00046 
00047         // Base GUI setup
00048     setupUi(this);
00049     setWindowTitle(tr("%1 :. Qt4 GUI for Wine v%2").arg(APP_NAME) .arg(APP_VERS));
00050

00057 
00058         // Timer flag to running
00059         _IS_TIMER_RUNNING=TRUE;
00060

00159 void MainWindow::cmdWinetricks_Click() {
00160     #ifndef WITH_WINETOOLS
00161     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("<p>q4wine was compiled without winetriks support.</p><p>If you wish to enable winetriks support add:</p><p> \"-DWITH_WINETOOLS=ON\" to cmake arguments.</p>"));
00162     #else
00163     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("<p>Winetricks officaly NOT supported by q4wine.</p><p>There was some repports about bugs, slows and errors on winetriks and q4wine usage at same time.</p>"));
00164 
00165     if (core->getSettingValue("console", "bin").isEmpty()){
00166         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("<p>You do not set default console binary.</p><p>Set it into q4wine option dialog.</p>"));
00167         return;
00168     }
00169 
00170     winetricks *w = new winetricks (cbPrefixes->currentText());
00171     w->exec();
00172     #endif
00173     return;
00174 }

00187 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ItemClick(QListWidgetItem * item){
00188 
00189     /*
00190      * This is function for selection icons, and displaying
00191      * icon informationm like path and description
00192      */
00193 
00194     if (!item)
00195         return;
00196 
00197     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
00198 
00199     if (!twPrograms->currentItem()){
00200         lstIcons->clear();
00201         return;
00202     }
00203 
00204     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00205 
00206     QSqlQuery query;
00207 
00208     if (treeItem->parent()){
00209         query.exec(tr("SELECT name, desc FROM icon WHERE dir_id=(SELECT id FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=\"%1\") AND name=\"%2\") and name=\"%3\"").arg(treeItem->parent()->text(0)) .arg(treeItem->text(0)) .arg(item->text()));
00210     } else {
00211         query.exec(tr("SELECT name, desc FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=\"%1\") AND  dir_id ISNULL AND name=\"%2\"").arg(treeItem->text(0)) .arg(item->text()));
00212     }
00213 
00214     query.next();
00215     lblInfo->setText(tr("Program: %1<br> Description: %2").arg(query.value(0).toString()) .arg(query.value(1).toString()));
00216 
00217     return;
00218 }

00334 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_SettingCheck(QString filePath, QString message){
00335     /*
00336      * Cheking for correct file\directory path
00337      */
00338 
00339     QFileInfo *file = new QFileInfo(filePath);
00340 
00341     if (!file->exists ()){
00342         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("<p>%1</p><p>File or path not exists: \"%2\"</p><p>Please, go to %3 options dialog and set it.</p>").arg(message).arg(filePath).arg(APP_SHORT_NAME));
00343         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Warning: \"%1\" use options dialog for fix").arg(message));
00344     }
00345 
00346     return;
00347 }

00349 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(QListWidgetItem * item){
00350     /*
00351     * This is function for getting icon settings and run associated program
00352     */
00353 
00354     statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Starting programm..."));
00355 
00356     if (!twPrograms->currentItem()){
00357         lstIcons->clear();
00358         return;
00359     }
00360 
00361     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
00362     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00363     QSqlQuery query;
00364 
00365     //QString execcmd, prefixid, runcmd, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir, envargs;
00366 
00367     //Getting icon info
00368     if (treeItem->parent()){
00369         query.prepare("SELECT exec, prefix_id, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir, desktop, nice FROM icon WHERE dir_id=(SELECT id FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name) AND name=:dir_name) and name=:icon_name");
00370         query.bindValue(":prefix_name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
00371         query.bindValue(":dir_name", treeItem->text(0));
00372         query.bindValue(":icon_name", item->text());
00373     } else {
00374         query.prepare("SELECT exec, prefix_id, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir, desktop, nice FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name) AND  dir_id ISNULL AND name=:icon_name");
00375         query.bindValue(":prefix_name", treeItem->text(0));
00376         query.bindValue(":icon_name", item->text());
00377     }
00378 
00379     query.exec();
00380     query.first();
00381 
00382     //Saving icon info
00383 
00384     ExecObject execObj;
00385 
00386     execObj.execcmd = query.value(0).toString();
00387     execObj.prefixid = query.value(1).toString();
00388     execObj.useconsole = query.value(2).toString();
00389     execObj.cmdargs = query.value(3).toString();
00390     execObj.override = query.value(4).toString();
00391     execObj.winedebug = query.value(5).toString();
00392     execObj.display = query.value(6).toString();
00393     execObj.wrkdir = query.value(7).toString();
00394     execObj.desktop = query.value(8).toString();
00395     execObj.nice = query.value(9).toString();
00396 
00397     query.clear();
00398 
00399     CoreFunction_WinePrepareRunParams(execObj);
00400 
00401     return;
00402 }
00403 
00404 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_WinePrepareRunParams(ExecObject execObj){
00405     /*
00406      * Function prepare params for running with WineRun
00407      */
00408 
00409     QSqlQuery query;
00410 
00411     query.prepare("SELECT path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_exec, wine_server FROM prefix WHERE id=:prefix_id");
00412     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", execObj.prefixid);
00413     query.exec();
00414     query.first();
00415 
00416     QString exec;
00417     QStringList args;
00418     QString envargs;
00419 
00420     if (execObj.useconsole == "1"){
00421         // If we gona use console output, so exec program is program specificed at CONSOLE global variable
00422         exec = CONSOLE_BIN;
00423 
00424         if (!CONSOLE_ARGS.isEmpty()){
00425             // If we have any conslope parametres, we gona preccess them one by one
00426             QStringList cons_args = CONSOLE_ARGS.split(" ");
00427             for (int i=0; i<cons_args.count(); i++){
00428                 if (!cons_args.at(i).isEmpty())
00429                     args.append(cons_args.at(i));
00430             }
00431         }
00432 
00433         args.append(SH_BIN);
00434 
00435     } else {
00436         exec = SH_BIN;
00437     }
00438 
00439     args.append("-c");
00440 
00441 
00442     if ((execObj.useconsole == "1") && (!execObj.wrkdir.isNull())){
00443         envargs.append(" cd \"");
00444         envargs.append(execObj.wrkdir);
00445         envargs.append("\" ; ");
00446     }
00447 
00448     if (!query.value(0).toString().isEmpty()){
00449         //If icon has prefix -- add to args
00450         envargs.append(tr(" WINEPREFIX=%1 ").arg(query.value(0).toString()));
00451     } else {
00452         //Else use default prefix
00453         envargs.append(tr(" WINEPREFIX=%1/.wine ").arg(HOME_PATH));
00454     }
00455 
00456     if (!query.value(1).toString().isEmpty()){
00457         envargs.append(tr(" WINEDLLPATH=%1 ").arg(query.value(1).toString()));
00458     } else {
00459         envargs.append(tr(" WINEDLLPATH=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_LIBS));
00460     }
00461 
00462     if (!query.value(2).toString().isEmpty()){
00463         envargs.append(tr(" WINELOADER=%1 ").arg(query.value(2).toString()));
00464     } else {
00465         envargs.append(tr(" WINELOADER=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_LOADER));
00466     }
00467 
00468     if (!query.value(4).toString().isEmpty()){
00469         envargs.append(tr(" WINESERVER=%1 ").arg(query.value(4).toString()));
00470     } else {
00471         envargs.append(tr(" WINESERVER=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_SERVER));
00472     }
00473 
00474     if (!execObj.override.isEmpty()){
00475         envargs.append(tr(" WINEDLLOVERRIDES=\"%1\" ").arg(execObj.override));
00476     }
00477 
00478     if (!execObj.winedebug.isEmpty() && execObj.useconsole == "1"){
00479         envargs.append(tr(" WINEDEBUG=%1 ").arg(execObj.winedebug));
00480     }
00481 
00482     if (!execObj.display.isEmpty()){
00483         envargs.append(tr(" DISPLAY=%1 ").arg(execObj.display));
00484     }
00485 
00486     QString exec_string = "";
00487 
00488     exec_string.append(envargs);
00489 
00490     if(!execObj.nice.isEmpty()){
00491         exec_string.append(NICE_BIN);
00492         exec_string.append(" -n ");
00493         exec_string.append(execObj.nice);
00494     }
00495 
00496     exec_string.append(" ");
00497 
00498     if (!query.value(3).toString().isEmpty()){
00499         exec_string.append(query.value(3).toString());
00500     } else {
00501         exec_string.append(DEFAULT_WINE_BIN);
00502     }
00503 
00504     exec_string.append(" ");
00505 
00506     if (!execObj.desktop.isEmpty()){
00507         exec_string.append(" explorer.exe /desktop=");
00508         exec_string.append(execObj.desktop);
00509     }
00510 
00511     exec_string.append(" \"");
00512     exec_string.append(execObj.execcmd);
00513     exec_string.append("\" ");
00514     exec_string.append(execObj.cmdargs);
00515 
00516     args.append(exec_string);
00517 
00518     query.clear();
00519 
00520     CoreFunction_WineRunProgram(exec, args, execObj.wrkdir);
00521     return;
00522 }
00523 
00524 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_WineRunProgram(QString exec, QStringList args, QString wrkdir){
00525 
00526     QProcess *proc;
00527 
00528     proc = new QProcess( this );
00529     if (!proc->startDetached( exec, args, wrkdir)){
00530         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Error: can't start %1").arg(exec));
00531     } else {
00532         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Start: Done (For more info, run in console mode)"));
00533     }
00534 
00535     return;
00536 }
00537 
00538 void MainWindow::twPrograms_ItemClick(QTreeWidgetItem * item, int){
00539 
00540     /*
00541      * This is check for root element, or not.
00542      * If yes -- show root-level Icons.
00543      * otherwise -- show children-level icons
00544      */
00545 
00546     QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
00547     QSqlQuery query;
00548 
00549     lstIcons->clear();
00550     lblInfo->setText(tr("Program: <br> Description:"));
00551 
00552     if (!item)
00553         return;
00554 
00555     QStringList getData = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(item);
00556 
00557     if (item->parent()){
00558         query.prepare("SELECT name, icon_path FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
00559         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", getData.at(0));
00560         query.bindValue(":dir_id", getData.at(2));
00561 
00562     } else {
00563         query.prepare("SELECT name, icon_path FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
00564         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", getData.at(0));
00565     }
00566 
00567     query.exec();
00568 
00569     while (query.next()) {
00570         iconItem = new QListWidgetItem(lstIcons, 0);
00571         iconItem->setText(query.value(0).toString());
00572 
00573         //Seting icon. If no icon or icon file not exists -- setting default
00574         if (query.value(1).toString().isEmpty()){
00575 
00576             iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/exec_wine.png"));
00577         } else {
00578             if (QFile::exists (query.value(1).toString())){
00579                iconItem->setIcon(QIcon(query.value(1).toString()));
00580             } else {
00581                 if (query.value(1).toString()=="wineconsole"){
00582                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/wineconsole.png"));
00583                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="regedit"){
00584                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/regedit.png"));
00585                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="wordpad"){
00586                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/notepad.png"));
00587                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="winecfg"){
00588                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/winecfg.png"));
00589                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="uninstaller"){
00590                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/uninstaller.png"));
00591                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="eject"){
00592                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/eject.png"));
00593                 } else if (query.value(1).toString()=="explorer"){
00594                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/explorer.png"));
00595                 } else {
00596                     iconItem->setIcon(CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/exec_wine.png"));
00597                 }
00598             }
00599 
00600             // If icon cutted -- set icon disabled style
00601 
00602             // FIXME: It pice works fine, but we nead to usse pixmaps fo grayscale, not Qt::ItemIsEnabled flag....
00603             // FIXME: It is optional, i don't work on it until release... ;)
00604 
00605             //if ((getData.at(0)==iconBuffer.prefix_id) and (getData.at(2)==iconBuffer.dir_id)){
00606             //  if (iconBuffer.names.indexOf (query.value(0).toString())!=-1)
00607             //      iconItem->setFlags(!Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
00608             //}
00609         }
00610     }
00611 
00612     query.clear();
00613 
00614 
00615     return;
00616 }
00617 
00618 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_DatabaseUpdateConnectedItems(int currentPrefix){
00619     /*
00620         Function for updating objects content to database values
00621     */
00622 
00623     QSqlQuery query;
00624     QSqlQuery subQuery;
00625     QTreeWidgetItem *prefixItem;
00626     QTreeWidgetItem *subPrefixItem;
00627 
00628     // Updating "Program Files" TreeView ptrefix root items
00629     twPrograms->clear();
00630     lstIcons->clear();
00631     query.exec("SELECT id,name FROM prefix ORDER BY id;");
00632     while (query.next()) {
00633         prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(twPrograms);
00634         prefixItem->setText(0, tr("%1").arg(query.value(1).toString()));
00635         prefixItem->setIcon(0, CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/wine.png"));
00636         prefixItem->setExpanded (TRUE);
00637         twPrograms->addTopLevelItem(&QTreeWidgetItem(prefixItem));
00638         subQuery.exec(tr("SELECT id,name FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=%1").arg(query.value(0).toString()));
00639         while (subQuery.next()){
00640             subPrefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(prefixItem, 0);
00641             subPrefixItem->setText(0, tr("%1").arg(subQuery.value(1).toString()));
00642             subPrefixItem->setIcon(0, CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/folder.png"));
00643         }
00644     }
00645 
00646     // Updating ComboBox prefix items
00647     cbPrefixes->clear();
00648 
00649     query.exec("SELECT id,name,version FROM prefix ORDER BY id;");
00650     while (query.next()) {
00651         cbPrefixes->addItem ( tr("%1").arg(query.value(1).toString()));
00652     }
00653 
00654     int curRows = 0, numRows = 0;
00655     numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00656 
00657     query.exec("SELECT name,version,path FROM prefix ORDER BY id;");
00658     while (query.next()) {
00659         curRows++;
00660 
00661         if (curRows>numRows){
00662             tablePrefix->insertRow (numRows);
00663             numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00664         }
00665             if (tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
00666             tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(query.value(0).toString());
00667             tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(query.value(1).toString());
00668             tablePrefix->item(curRows - 1, 2)->setText(query.value(2).toString());
00669         } else {
00670                 QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(query.value(0).toString());
00671             tablePrefix->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
00672             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00673             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(query.value(1).toString());
00674             tablePrefix->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
00675             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00676             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(query.value(2).toString());
00677             tablePrefix->setItem(curRows - 1, 2, newItem);
00678             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00679         }
00680     }
00681 
00682     numRows = tablePrefix->rowCount();
00683     if (numRows > curRows){
00684         for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
00685             tablePrefix->removeRow(curRows);
00686     }
00687 
00688     if (currentPrefix > 0)
00689         cbPrefixes->setCurrentIndex (currentPrefix);
00690 
00691     return;
00692 }
00693

00696     return;
00697 }

00716         prefixSettings->setEnabled(TRUE);
00717     } else {

00719         prefixImport->setEnabled(FALSE);

00721         prefixSettings->setEnabled(FALSE);
00722     }

00741 void MainWindow::twPrograms_ShowContextMenu(const QPoint){
00742     /*
00743         Custom context menu for twPrograms
00744     */
00745 
00746     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
00747     QSqlQuery query;
00748     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00749 
00750     twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
00751 
00752     if (!treeItem)
00753         return;
00754 
00755     if (treeItem->parent()){
00756         query.prepare("select cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount from prefix where name=:name");
00757         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
00758         query.exec();
00759         query.first();
00760     } else {
00761         query.prepare("select cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount from prefix where name=:name");
00762         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
00763         query.exec();
00764         query.first();
00765     }
00766 
00767     QString mount_drive, mount_point;
00768     mount_drive = query.value(0).toString();
00769     mount_point = query.value(1).toString();
00770     query.clear();
00771 
00772     QMenu* menuDirMountImages;
00773     menuDirMountImages = new QMenu(this);
00774 
00775     if (!treeItem->parent()){
00776         dirRename->setEnabled(FALSE);
00777         dirDelete->setEnabled(FALSE);
00778     } else {
00779         dirRename->setEnabled(TRUE);
00780         dirDelete->setEnabled(TRUE);
00781     }
00782 
00783         QStringList arguments;
00784 
00785             #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00786                 arguments << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(mount_point);
00787             #endif
00788             #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00789                 arguments << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(mount_point);
00790             #endif
00791 
00792             QProcess *myProcess = new QProcess(this);
00793         myProcess->start(SH_BIN, arguments);
00794 
00795             if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
00796                 qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
00797                 return;
00798             }
00799             //else
00800                 QString out = myProcess->readAll();
00801                     if (!out.isEmpty()){
00802                         out = out.split(" ").first();
00803                         if (!out.isEmpty()){
00804                             #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00805                             if (out.contains("loop")){
00806                             #endif
00807                             #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00808                             if (out.contains("md")){
00809                             #endif
00810                                 myProcess->close ();
00811                                 arguments.clear();
00812                                 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00813                                 arguments << "losetup" << out;
00814                                 #endif
00815                                 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00816                                 arguments << "mdconfig" <<  "-l" << tr("-u%1").arg(out.mid(7));
00817                                 #endif
00818 
00819                                 myProcess->start(SUDO_BIN, arguments);
00820                                     if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
00821                                         qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
00822                                         return;
00823                                     } else {
00824                                         out = myProcess->readAll();
00825                                             if (!out.isEmpty()){
00826                                                 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00827                                                     out = out.split("/").last().split(")").first();
00828                                                 #endif
00829                                                 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00830                                                     out = out.split("/").last().mid(0, out.split("/").last().length()-1);
00831                                                 #endif
00832                                             }
00833                                     }
00834                             }
00835                         } else {
00836                             out = "none";
00837                         }
00838                     } else {
00839                         out = "none";
00840                     }
00841 
00842             menuDirMount->clear();
00843             menuDirMountImages = menuDirMount->addMenu(tr("mount [%1]").arg(out));
00844             if (!mount_drive.isEmpty()){
00845                 menuDirMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/drive_menu.png"), mount_drive);
00846                 menuDirMountImages->addSeparator();
00847             }
00848 
00849                 query.exec("SELECT name FROM images ORDER BY name");
00850                 while (query.next()) {
00851                     menuDirMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/cdrom_menu.png"), query.value(0).toString());
00852                 }
00853 
00854             menuDirMount->addAction(dirUnmount);
00855             menuDirMount->addAction(dirMountOther);
00856 
00857             connect (menuDirMountImages, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(menuMountImages_triggered(QAction*)));
00858 
00859         if (!mount_point.isEmpty()){
00860             dirUnmount->setEnabled(TRUE);
00861             dirMountOther->setEnabled(TRUE);
00862             dirUnmount->setText(tr("umount [%1]").arg(mount_point));
00863         } else {
00864             dirUnmount->setEnabled(FALSE);
00865             dirMountOther->setEnabled(FALSE);
00866             dirUnmount->setText(tr("umount [none]"));
00867         }
00868 
00869         query.clear();
00870 
00871         menuDir->exec(QCursor::pos());
00872     return;
00873 }
00874 
00875 void MainWindow::menuMountImages_triggered ( QAction * action ){
00876     /*
00877      * This slot process menuDirMountImages and menuIconMountImages triggered signal
00878      */
00879 
00880     QSqlQuery query;
00881     QString fileName, mountPoint;
00882 
00883     if (action->text().contains("/dev/")){
00884 
00885         fileName = action->text();
00886     } else {
00887         query.prepare("SELECT path FROM images WHERE name=:name");
00888         query.bindValue(":name", action->text());
00889         query.exec();
00890         query.first();
00891         if (query.isValid()){
00892             fileName = query.value(0).toString();
00893         }
00894     }
00895 
00896         query.clear();
00897 
00898         QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
00899         query.prepare("select cdrom_mount from prefix where id=:id");
00900         query.bindValue(":id", dataList.at(0));
00901         if (!query.exec()){
00902             return;
00903         }
00904 
00905         query.first();
00906 
00907         if (query.value(0).toString().isEmpty()){
00908             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("It seems no mount point was set in prefix options.<br>You might need to set it manualy."));
00909             return;
00910         }
00911 
00912         mountPoint = query.value(0).toString();
00913 
00914         CoreFunction_ImageMount(fileName, mountPoint);
00915 
00916     return;
00917 }

00919 void MainWindow::lstIcons_ShowContextMenu(const QPoint){
00920     /*
00921         Function showing context menu
00922     */
00923 
00924     QListWidgetItem * item;
00925     item = lstIcons->currentItem();
00926 
00927     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
00928     QSqlQuery query;
00929     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
00930 
00931     QString cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount;
00932 
00933     if (!treeItem)
00934         return;
00935 
00936     if (treeItem->parent()){
00937         query.prepare("select cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount from prefix where name=:name");
00938         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
00939         query.exec();
00940         query.first();
00941     } else {
00942         query.prepare("select cdrom_drive, cdrom_mount from prefix where name=:name");
00943         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
00944         query.exec();
00945         query.first();
00946     }
00947 
00948         cdrom_drive = query.value(0).toString();
00949         cdrom_mount = query.value(1).toString();
00950 
00951     query.clear();
00952 
00953         QMenu* menuIconMountImages;
00954         menuIconMountImages = new QMenu(this);
00955 
00956             QStringList arguments;
00957 
00958             #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00959                 arguments << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(cdrom_mount);
00960             #endif
00961             #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00962                 arguments << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(cdrom_mount);
00963             #endif
00964 
00965             QProcess *myProcess = new QProcess(this);
00966         myProcess->start(SH_BIN, arguments);
00967             if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
00968                 qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
00969                 return;
00970             }
00971             //else
00972                 QString out = myProcess->readAll();
00973                     if (!out.isEmpty()){
00974                         out = out.split(" ").first();
00975                         if (!out.isEmpty()){
00976                             #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00977                             if (out.contains("loop")){
00978                             #endif
00979                             #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00980                             if (out.contains("md")){
00981                             #endif
00982                                 myProcess->close ();
00983                                 arguments.clear();
00984                                 #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00985                                 arguments << "losetup" << out;
00986                                 #endif
00987                                 #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00988                                 arguments << "mdconfig" <<  "-l" << tr("-u%1").arg(out.mid(7));
00989                                 #endif
00990                                 myProcess->start(SUDO_BIN, arguments);
00991                                     if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
00992                                         qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
00993                                         return;
00994                                     } else {
00995                                         out = myProcess->readAll();
00996                                         #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00997                                             out = out.split("/").last().mid(0, out.split("/").last().length()-2);
00998                                         #endif
00999                                         #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
01000                                             out = out.split("/").last().mid(0, out.split("/").last().length()-1);
01001                                         #endif
01002 
01003                                     }
01004                             }
01005                         } else {
01006                             out = "none";
01007                         }
01008                     } else {
01009                         out = "none";
01010                     }
01011 
01012             menuIconMount->clear();
01013             menuIconMountImages = menuIconMount->addMenu(tr("mount [%1]").arg(out));
01014 
01015             if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
01016                 menuIconMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/drive_menu.png"), cdrom_drive);
01017                 menuIconMountImages->addSeparator();
01018             }
01019 
01020             menuIconMount->addAction(iconUnmount);
01021             menuIconMount->addAction(iconMountOther);
01022 
01023                 query.exec("SELECT name FROM images ORDER BY name");
01024                 while (query.next()) {
01025                     menuIconMountImages->addAction(QIcon(":/data/cdrom_menu.png") ,query.value(0).toString());
01026                 }
01027                 query.clear();
01028             connect (menuIconMountImages, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(menuMountImages_triggered(QAction*)));
01029 
01030         if (item){
01031             if ((!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()) && (!cdrom_mount.isEmpty())){
01032                 iconMount->setEnabled(TRUE);
01033                 iconUnmount->setEnabled(TRUE);
01034                 iconMount->setText(tr("mount [%1]").arg(cdrom_drive.split("/").last()));
01035                 iconUnmount->setText(tr("umount [%1]").arg(cdrom_mount));
01036             } else {
01037                 iconMount->setEnabled(FALSE);
01038                 iconUnmount->setEnabled(FALSE);
01039                 iconMount->setText(tr("mount [none]"));
01040                 iconUnmount->setText(tr("umount [none]"));
01041             }
01042 
01043             if (!cdrom_drive.isEmpty()){
01044                 iconMountOther->setEnabled(TRUE);
01045             } else {
01046                 iconMountOther->setEnabled(FALSE);
01047             }
01048 
01049         }
01050 
01051 
01052         query.clear();
01053 
01054         QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
01055         iconItem=lstIcons->currentItem();
01056 
01057         if(iconItem){
01058             iconRun->setEnabled(TRUE);
01059             iconOptions->setEnabled(TRUE);
01060             iconRename->setEnabled(TRUE);
01061             iconDelete->setEnabled(TRUE);
01062             iconCut->setEnabled(TRUE);
01063             iconCopy->setEnabled(TRUE);
01064             menuIconMount->setEnabled(TRUE);
01065         } else {
01066             iconRun->setEnabled(FALSE);
01067             iconOptions->setEnabled(FALSE);
01068             iconRename->setEnabled(FALSE);
01069             iconDelete->setEnabled(FALSE);
01070             iconCut->setEnabled(FALSE);
01071             iconCopy->setEnabled(FALSE);
01072             menuIconMount->setEnabled(FALSE);
01073         }
01074 
01075         if (iconBuffer.names.count()>0){
01076             iconPaste->setEnabled(TRUE);
01077         } else {
01078             iconPaste->setEnabled(FALSE);
01079         }
01080 
01081         menuIcon->exec(QCursor::pos());
01082 
01083       return;
01084 }

01086 void MainWindow::createTrayIcon(){
01087     trayIconMenu = new QMenu(this);
01088     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainRun);
01089     trayIconMenu->addSeparator();
01090     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainExportIcons);
01091     trayIconMenu->addSeparator();
01092     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainImageManage);
01093     trayIconMenu->addSeparator();
01094     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainPrograms);
01095     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainProcess);
01096     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainSetup);
01097     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainPrefix);
01098     trayIconMenu->addSeparator();
01099     trayIconMenu->addAction(mainExit);
01100 
01101     trayIcon = new QSystemTrayIcon(this);
01102     trayIcon->setContextMenu(trayIconMenu);
01103 
01104     QIcon icon = CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/q4wine.png");
01105 
01106     trayIcon->setIcon(icon);
01107     setWindowIcon(icon);
01108 
01109     if (SHOW_TRAREY_ICON){
01110         trayIcon->show();
01111     } else {
01112         trayIcon->hide();
01113     }
01114 
01115     connect(trayIcon, SIGNAL(activated(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason)), this, SLOT(trayIcon_Activate(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason)));
01116 
01117 
01118 }
01119 
01120 void MainWindow::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event){
01121     if (trayIcon->isVisible()) {
01122         hide();
01123         event->ignore();
01124     }
01125 
01126     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
01127     settings.beginGroup("MainWindow");
01128     settings.setValue("size", size());
01129     settings.setValue("pos", pos());
01130     settings.endGroup();
01131 }
01132 
01133 
01134 bool MainWindow::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
01135 
01136     // twPrograms events
01137 
01138     if (obj == twPrograms) {
01139         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
01140         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyRelease) {
01141 
01142 
01143             if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Up) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Down)){
01144                 if (twPrograms->currentItem())
01145                     twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
01146                 return true;
01147             }
01148 
01149 
01150         }
01151 
01152         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress){
01153             if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Tab)){
01154                 lstIcons->setFocus();
01155                 if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01156                     lstIcons_ItemClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01157                 return true;
01158             }
01159 
01160             if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete){
01161                 if (twPrograms->currentItem())
01162                     dirDelete_Click();
01163                 return true;
01164             }
01165         }
01166 
01167         return false;
01168 
01169     }
01170 
01171     // lstIcons events
01172 
01173     if (obj == lstIcons){
01174         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
01175 
01176         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyRelease) {
01177 
01178 
01179             if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Up) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Down) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Left) or (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Right)){
01180                 if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01181                     lstIcons_ItemClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01182                 return true;
01183             }
01184         }
01185 
01186         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress){
01187             if ((keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Tab)){
01188                 twPrograms->setFocus();
01189                 return true;
01190             }
01191 
01192             if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Return){
01193                 if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01194                     lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(lstIcons->currentItem());
01195                 return true;
01196             }
01197 
01198             if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete){
01199                 if (lstIcons->currentItem())
01200                     iconDelete_Click();
01201                 return true;
01202             }
01203         }
01204 
01205             return false;
01206     }
01207 
01208     return QMainWindow::eventFilter(obj, event);
01209 }
01210 
01211 
01212 void MainWindow::resizeEvent (QResizeEvent){
01213     /*
01214         Function for hendle resize event: tableProc ( )
01215     */
01216 
01217     CoreFunction_ResizeContent(1);
01218     CoreFunction_ResizeContent(3);
01219 
01220     return;
01221 }
01222 
01223 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ResizeContent(int tabIndex){
01224     /*
01225         Function for hendle resize event
01226 
01227         @screen -- tab id
01228     */
01229 
01230     switch (tabIndex){
01231         case 1:
01232             //Initiate /proc reading
01233                         if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING){
01234                 getWineProccessInfo();
01235                 // Starting timer for reading /proc
01236                 timer->start(1000);
01237             }
01238 
01239             tableProc->resizeRowsToContents();
01240             tableProc->resizeColumnsToContents();
01241             tableProc->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
01242         break;
01243         case 3:
01244 
01245             tablePrefix->resizeRowsToContents();
01246             tablePrefix->resizeColumnsToContents();
01247             tablePrefix->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
01248 
01249             // Stopping timer for reading /proc
01250                         if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01251                 timer->stop();
01252         break;
01253         default:
01254             // Stopping timer for reading /proc
01255                         if (_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01256                 timer->stop();
01257         break;
01258     }
01259 
01260     return;
01261 }
01262 
01263 void MainWindow::processRenice_Click(void){
01264     /*
01265      *  Getting nice level from user
01266      */
01267 
01268     bool ok;
01269 
01270     int rowNum;
01271     rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01272 
01273     if (rowNum>=0){
01274         int curNice;
01275         curNice = tableProc->item(rowNum, 2)->text().toInt();
01276 
01277      int i = QInputDialog::getInteger(this, tr("Select process priority"), tr("<p>Priority value can be in<br>the range from PRIO_MIN (-20)<br>to PRIO_MAX (20).</p><p>See \"man renice\" for details.</p>"), curNice, -20, 20, 1, &ok);
01278 
01279      if (ok)
01280        CoreFunction_SetProcNicePriority(i, tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text().toInt());
01281     }
01282 }
01283 
01284 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_SetProcNicePriority(int priority, int pid){
01285     /*
01286      * Core function for executing renice command
01287      */
01288 
01289     QStringList args;
01290     QString arg;
01291        args << RENICE_BIN;
01292        args.append(tr("%1").arg(priority));
01293        args.append(tr("%1").arg(pid));
01294 
01295     //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
01296     if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
01297        arg=args.join(" ");
01298        args.clear();
01299        args<<arg;
01300     }
01301 
01302     Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("reniceing..."), tr("reniceing..."));
01303     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01304        getWineProccessInfo();
01305     } else {
01306        statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Renice fail fail"));
01307     }
01308 
01309     return;
01310 }
01311 
01312 void MainWindow::getWineProccessInfo(void){
01313         // If _RUN_TIMER==FALSE then timer is stopped by user
01314         if (!_IS_TIMER_RUNNING)
01315             return;
01316 
01317         QList<QStringList> proclist;
01318         int numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01319         int curRows = 0;
01320 
01321         // Getting QList of QStringList which describes running wine processes
01322         proclist = CoreLib->getWineProcessList();
01323 
01324         // Preccess QList items one by one
01325         for (int i = 0; i < proclist.size(); ++i) {
01326             //If first element value "-1" -- then disable timer and set _IS_TIMER_RUNNING flag
01327             if (proclist.at(i).at(0) == "-1"){
01328                 _IS_TIMER_RUNNING=false;
01329                 timer->stop();
01330                 return;
01331             }
01332 
01333             curRows++;
01334 
01335             if (curRows>numRows){
01336                 tableProc->insertRow (numRows);
01337                 numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01338             }
01339 
01340             if (tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
01341                  tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(0));
01342                  tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(1));
01343                  tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 2)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(2));
01344                  tableProc->item(curRows - 1, 3)->setText(proclist.at(i).at(3));
01345             } else {
01346                  QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(0));
01347                  tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
01348                  newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01349                  newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(1));
01350                  tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
01351                  newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01352                  newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(2));
01353                  tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 2, newItem);
01354                  newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01355                  newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(proclist.at(i).at(3));
01356                  tableProc->setItem(curRows - 1, 3, newItem);
01357                  newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
01358             }
01359 
01360         }
01361 
01362 
01363     // Remove unneaded entyes
01364     numRows = tableProc->rowCount();
01365     if (numRows > curRows)
01366             for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
01367                 tableProc->removeRow(curRows);
01368 
01369 
01370     lblProcInfo->setText(tr("Total process: %1").arg(numRows));
01371 
01372     // Setting buttons
01373     if (tableProc->currentRow()>=0){
01374         processKillSelected->setEnabled(TRUE);
01375         processKillWine->setEnabled(TRUE);
01376         processRenice->setEnabled(TRUE);
01377     } else {
01378         processKillSelected->setEnabled(FALSE);
01379         processKillWine->setEnabled(FALSE);
01380         processRenice->setEnabled(FALSE);
01381         }
01382 
01383     return;
01384 }
01385 
01386 void MainWindow::cmdCreateFake_Click(){
01387 
01388     QString prefixPath = core->getPrefixPath(cbPrefixes->currentText(), FALSE);
01389 
01390     QString sysregPath;
01391     sysregPath.append(prefixPath);
01392     sysregPath.append("/system.reg");
01393 
01394     QFile sysreg_file (sysregPath);
01395 
01396     if (sysreg_file.exists()){
01397         if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("There are other Fake drive installed in %1 prefix directory.<br><br>Do you wish to REMOVE ALL FILES from prefix folder?").arg(prefixPath), QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01398 
01399                 QStringList args;
01400                 args << "-rdf";
01401                 args << prefixPath;
01402 
01403                 Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, "/bin/rm", HOME_PATH, tr("Removing old fake drive.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Removing old fake drive"));
01404 
01405                 if (exportProcess->exec()!=QDialog::Accepted){
01406                     return;
01407                 }
01408         } else {
01409             return;
01410         }
01411     }
01412 
01413     QDir fakeDir (prefixPath);
01414         if (!fakeDir.exists())
01415             fakeDir.mkdir(prefixPath);
01416 
01417     Wizard *createFakeDriveWizard = new Wizard(2, cbPrefixes->currentText());
01418         if (createFakeDriveWizard->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01419             CoreFunction_DatabaseUpdateConnectedItems(cbPrefixes->currentIndex());
01420         }
01421 
01422     return;
01423 }

01454 void MainWindow::processKillWine_Click(){
01455     //     (   =))
01456     int rowNum;
01457     rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01458 
01459     if (rowNum>=0){
01460         QString prefixPath;
01461         prefixPath = tableProc->item(rowNum, 3)->text();
01462 
01463         if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("This action will send a TREM(-9) signal to all wine proccess with WINEPREFIX='%1'<br><br>Do you really want to proceed?").arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 3)->text()), QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01464             QString command;
01465 
01466             if (!prefixPath.isEmpty())
01467                 command=tr("env WINEPREFIX=\"%1\" wineserver -kill").arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 3)->text());
01468             else
01469                 command="wineserver -kill";
01470                       if (system(command.toAscii().data())==-1)
01471                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Can't run: %1").arg(command.toAscii().data()), QMessageBox::Ok);
01472         }
01473     }
01474     return;
01475 }
01476 
01477 void MainWindow::processKillSelected_Click(){
01478     int rowNum;
01479     rowNum = tableProc->currentRow();
01480 
01481     if (rowNum>=0){
01482         QString procId;
01483         procId = tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text();
01484 
01485         if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("This action will send a TREM(-9) signal to proccess '%2' pid: %1<br><br>It is HIGH risk to damage wine normal state.<br><br>Do you really want to proceed?").arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 0)->text()) .arg(tableProc->item(rowNum, 1)->text()),                   QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
01486 
01487             QString command;
01488             command="kill -9 ";
01489             command.append(procId);
01490                 if (system(command.toAscii().data())==-1)
01491                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Can't run: %1").arg(command.toAscii().data()), QMessageBox::Ok);
01492         }
01493     }
01494     return;
01495 }

01513 void MainWindow::prefixDelete_Click(){
01514 
01515     if (tablePrefix->currentRow()>=0){
01516         if (tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()=="Default"){
01517             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"),
01518        tr("Sorry, you can't delete Default prefix."), QMessageBox::Ok);
01519             return;
01520         }
01521 
01522         if(QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
01523        tr("Do you really wish to delete prefix named \"%1\" and all associated icons?").arg(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()), QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel)==QMessageBox::Ok){
01524 
01525                 QSqlQuery q;
01526                     q.prepare("SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:name;");
01527                     q.bindValue(":name", tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text());
01528                 q.exec();
01529                 q.first();
01530 
01531                 QString prefix_id=q.value(0).toString();
01532 
01533                 q.clear();
01534 
01535                 if (prefix_id.isEmpty())
01536                     return;
01537 
01538                 q.prepare("DELETE FROM prefix WHERE id=:prefix_id;");
01539                 q.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
01540                 q.exec();
01541                 q.clear();
01542 
01543                 q.prepare("DELETE FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id;");
01544                 q.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
01545                 q.exec();
01546                 q.clear();
01547 
01548                 q.prepare("DELETE FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id;");
01549                 q.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
01550                 q.exec();
01551                 q.clear();
01552 
01553         }
01554     }
01555 
01556     CoreFunction_DatabaseUpdateConnectedItems();
01557     return;
01558 }
01559 
01560 void MainWindow::prefixImport_Click(){
01561     /*
01562         Function for importing preefix from file
01563     */
01564 
01565     QString openpath;
01566 
01567         //Getting user selected path for prefix store, if not -- use default
01568     if (!PREFIX_EI_PATH.isEmpty()){
01569         openpath.append(PREFIX_EI_PATH);
01570     } else {
01571 
01572             openpath.append(QDir::homePath());
01573             openpath.append("/.config/");
01574             openpath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01575             openpath.append("/prefixes/");
01576 
01577     }
01578 
01579     QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Select file to import"), openpath , tr("Images (*.tbz)"));
01580 
01581     if (!fileName.isEmpty()){
01582         QDir dir;
01583         QString targetDir;
01584 
01585         if (tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 2)->text().isEmpty()){
01586             targetDir.clear();
01587             targetDir.append(HOME_PATH);
01588             targetDir.append("/.wine/");
01589         } else {
01590             targetDir.clear();
01591             targetDir.append(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 2)->text());
01592         }
01593 
01594         if (dir.exists(targetDir)){
01595             if(QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"), tr("Do you really wish to delete all old prefix files?"), QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel)==QMessageBox::Ok){
01596 
01597 
01598                 QStringList args;
01599                 args << "-rdf";
01600                 args << targetDir;
01601 
01602                 Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, core->getWhichOut("rm"), HOME_PATH, tr("Removing old fake drive.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Removing old fake drive"));
01603 
01604                 if (exportProcess->exec()!=QDialog::Accepted){
01605                     return;
01606                 }
01607 
01608                 /*
01609                     QProgressDialog progress("Deleting files...", "Abort", -1, -1, this);
01610                     progress.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
01611                     progress.setValue(-1);
01612                     DeleteDirectory(targetDir);
01613                 */
01614             } else {
01615                 return;
01616             }
01617         }
01618 
01619             QStringList args;
01620             dir.mkdir(targetDir);
01621 
01622             args << "-xjf";
01623             args << fileName;
01624             args << "-C" << targetDir;
01625 
01626             //Creating process dialog
01627             Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, TAR_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Importing prefix.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Importing prefix"));
01628 
01629             exportProcess->show();
01630 
01631 
01632     }
01633 
01634     return;
01635 }

01640 void MainWindow::DeleteDirectory(QString path){
01641     QDir dir(path);
01642     QFile file;
01643     dir.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::System | QDir::NoDotAndDotDot );
01644

01646 
01647     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01648         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01649         if ((fileInfo.isDir()) and (!fileInfo.isSymLink())){
01650                 DeleteDirectory(fileInfo.filePath());
01651         } else {
01652             if (!file.remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
01653                 qDebug()<<"cant kill:"<<fileInfo.filePath();
01654         }
01655     }
01656 
01657     if (!dir.rmdir(path))
01658         qDebug()<<"cant kill dir:"<<path;
01659 
01660     return;

01674 void MainWindow::prefixExport_Click(){
01675     /*
01676         Function for exporting preefix to file
01677     */
01678 
01679     QString savepath;
01680 
01681     //Getting user selected path for prefix store, if not -- use default
01682     if (!PREFIX_EI_PATH.isEmpty()){
01683         savepath.append(PREFIX_EI_PATH);
01684     } else {
01685         savepath.append(QDir::homePath());
01686         savepath.append("/.config/");
01687         savepath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01688         savepath.append("/prefixes/");
01689     }
01690 
01691     //Creating save path
01692     savepath.append(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text());
01693     savepath.append("-");
01694     savepath.append(QDate::currentDate().toString(Qt::ISODate));
01695     savepath.append(".tbz");
01696 
01697     //Request user for valid save path
01698     QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Select file to export"), savepath , tr("Images (*.tbz)"));
01699 
01700     if (!fileName.isEmpty()){
01701         QStringList args;
01702 
01703         args << "-cjf";
01704         args << fileName;
01705 
01706 
01707         QString prefix_path = tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 2)->text();
01708 
01709         if (prefix_path.isEmpty()){
01710             prefix_path.clear();
01711             prefix_path.append(HOME_PATH);
01712             prefix_path.append("/.wine/");
01713         }
01714 
01715         args << "-C";
01716         args << prefix_path;
01717         args << "./";
01718 
01719         //Creating process dialog
01720         Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, TAR_BIN, prefix_path, tr("Exporting %1 prefix.<br>This can take a while...").arg(tablePrefix->item(tablePrefix->currentRow(), 0)->text()), tr("Exporting prefix"));
01721 
01722         exportProcess->show();
01723     }
01724 
01725     return;
01726 }

01829 void MainWindow::mainRun_Click(){

01838

01840     if (treeItem){
01841

01843         dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirInfo(treeItem);
01844         if (dataList.at(0)=="-1")
01845             return;
01846     } else {
01847         dataList << "" << "" << "";
01848     }
01849 
01850 
01851     if (!isVisible())
01852         SetMeVisible(TRUE);
01853 
01854     if (isMinimized ())
01855         showNormal ();
01856 
01857 
01858     Run *run = new Run(dataList.at(0), dataList.at(1), dataList.at(2));
01859 
01860     if (run->exec()==QDialog::Accepted)
01861         CoreFunction_WinePrepareRunParams(run->execObj);
01862 
01863     return;
01864 }

01917 
01918 void MainWindow::mainExportIcons_Click(){
01919     /*
01920      * main Menu allow export icons
01921      */
01922 
01923     if (!isVisible())
01924         SetMeVisible(TRUE);
01925 
01926     QString fileName, tmpDir;
01927     QStringList args;
01928 
01929     fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("Win32 Executable and Shared libraies (*.exe *.dll);;Win32 Executable (*.exe);;Win32 Shared libraies (*.dll)") );
01930 
01931     if(fileName.isEmpty())
01932         return;
01933 
01934     args << "-x";
01935     args << "-t" << "14";
01936 
01937     QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
01938 
01939     tmpDir.clear();
01940 
01941     tmpDir.append(QDir::homePath());
01942     tmpDir.append("/.config/");
01943     tmpDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
01944     tmpDir.append("/tmp/");
01945     tmpDir.append(list1.last());
01946 
01947     QDir tmp(tmpDir);
01948     tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
01949     QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
01950 
01951     if (tmp.exists(tmpDir)){
01952         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01953             QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01954             if (!tmp.remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
01955                 qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
01956         }
01957 
01958     } else {
01959         if (!tmp.mkdir(tmpDir)){
01960             qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't create temp directory at: "<<tmpDir;
01961         }
01962     }
01963 
01964 
01965     args << "-o" << tmpDir;
01966     args << fileName;
01967 
01968     Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, WRESTOOL_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Exporting icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Exporting icon"));
01969 
01970     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01971             //icotool -x -o ./regedit.png --width=32 --height=32 ./regedit.exe_14_100_0.ico
01972 
01973 
01974 
01975         args.clear();
01976         args << "-x";
01977         args << "-o" << tr("%1/").arg(tmpDir);
01978 
01979                 // Updating file index
01980         list = tmp.entryInfoList();
01981 
01982         //Creating file list for converting
01983         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
01984             QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
01985             if (fileInfo.fileName().right(3)=="ico")
01986                 args << fileInfo.filePath();
01987         }
01988 
01989 
01990         //Look here, this function checks is some icons found, or not. 5 -- is default number of arguments,
01991         //if more -- then we have some ico file to convert
01992         if (args.size()>=4){
01993 
01994             exportProcess = new Process(args, ICOTOOL_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Convering icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Converting icon"));
01995 
01996             if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
01997                 IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
01998                 iconsView->exec();
01999             }
02000 
02001         } else {
02002             IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
02003             iconsView->exec();
02004         }
02005     }
02006 
02007             //Clearing temp files
02008     list = tmp.entryInfoList();
02009 
02010                 //Creating file list for converting
02011     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
02012         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
02013         if (!QFile::remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
02014             qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
02015     }
02016 
02017     if (!tmp.rmdir(tmpDir))
02018         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete tmp dir: "<<tmpDir;
02019 
02020     return;
02021 }

02215 
02216 QIcon MainWindow::CoreFunction_IconLoad(QString iconName){
02217     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
02218     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
02219 
02220     QIcon icon;
02221 
02222     if ((!THEME_NAME.isEmpty()) and (THEME_NAME!="Default")){
02223         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(THEME_NAME).arg(iconName));
02224         if (icon.isNull()){
02225             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
02226         }
02227     } else {
02228         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
02229     }
02230 
02231     return icon;
02232 }

02264 
02265 void MainWindow::iconDelete_Click(void){
02266     /*
02267         This function delete add selected icons
02268     */
02269 
02270     QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList;
02271     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02272     QSqlQuery query;
02273 
02274     QString prefix_id, dir_id, icon_name;
02275 
02276     // Getting items
02277     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02278     icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02279 
02280 //  qDebug()<<
02281 
02282     if (!treeItem)
02283         return;
02284 
02285     if (icoList.count()<0)
02286         return;
02287 
02288     if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Delete Icon"), tr("Do you want to delete all selected icons?"),  QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No   )==QMessageBox::Yes){
02289 
02290         // We gona get prefix_id and dir_id by calling SQL_getPrefixAndDirData
02291         QStringList dataList;
02292         dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(treeItem);
02293 
02294         if (dataList.at(0)=="-1"){
02295             return;
02296         } else {
02297             prefix_id = dataList.at(0);
02298             dir_id = dataList.at(2);
02299         }
02300 
02301 
02302 
02303         for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02304             if(dir_id.isEmpty()){
02305                 query.prepare("DELETE FROM icon WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
02306             }else{
02307                 query.prepare("DELETE FROM icon WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
02308                 query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
02309             }
02310 
02311             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02312             query.bindValue(":name", icoList.at(i)->text());
02313 
02314             if (!query.exec()){
02315                 #ifdef DEBUG
02316                     qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::iconDelete_Click(void)\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02317                 #endif
02318                 return;
02319             }
02320             query.clear();
02321         }
02322         twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02323     }
02324     return;
02325 }
02326 
02327 void MainWindow::iconRun_Click(void){

02329     QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
02330     iconItem=lstIcons->currentItem();
02331     if (iconItem)
02332         lstIcons_ItemDoubleClick(iconItem);
02333     return;
02334 }
02335 
02336 void MainWindow::iconRename_Click(void){
02337 
02338     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02339     QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
02340     QSqlQuery query;
02341 
02342     QString prefix_id, dir_id, icon_name;
02343     bool ok;
02344 
02345     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02346     iconItem = lstIcons->currentItem();
02347 
02348     if (!treeItem)
02349         return;
02350 
02351     if (!iconItem)
02352         return;
02353 
02354     // We gona get prefix_id and dir_id by calling SQL_getPrefixAndDirData
02355     QStringList dataList;
02356     dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(treeItem);
02357     if (dataList.at(0)=="-1"){
02358         return;
02359     } else {
02360         prefix_id = dataList.at(0);
02361         dir_id = dataList.at(2);
02362     }
02363 
02364 
02365     QString text = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new icon name"), tr("Icon name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, iconItem->text(), &ok);
02366 
02367     if (ok && !text.isEmpty()){
02368 
02369 
02370         if(dir_id.isEmpty()){
02371             query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
02372         }else{
02373             query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
02374             query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
02375         }
02376 
02377         query.bindValue(":name", text);
02378         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02379 
02380         if (!query.exec()){
02381             #ifdef DEBUG
02382                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::iconRename_Click(void)\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02383             #endif
02384             return;
02385         }
02386         query.first();
02387 
02388         if (query.isValid ()){
02389             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but icon named %1 already exists.").arg(text));
02390             query.clear();
02391             return;
02392         }
02393         query.clear();
02394 
02395         if(dir_id.isEmpty()){
02396             query.prepare("UPDATE icon SET name=:new_name WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
02397         }else{
02398             query.prepare("UPDATE icon SET name=:new_name WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
02399             query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
02400         }
02401 
02402         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02403         query.bindValue(":new_name", text);
02404         query.bindValue(":name", iconItem->text());
02405 
02406         if (!query.exec()){
02407             #ifdef DEBUG
02408                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::iconRename_Click(void)\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02409             #endif
02410             return;
02411         }
02412         query.clear();
02413 
02414         // Updating icons view
02415         twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02416 
02417     }
02418     return;
02419 }
02420 
02421 void MainWindow::iconAdd_Click(void){
02422     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02423     QSqlQuery query;
02424 
02425     //QString prefix_id, dir_id, prefix_dir;
02426 
02427     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02428 
02429     if (!treeItem)
02430         return;
02431 
02432     // We gona get prefix_id and dir_id by calling SQL_getPrefixAndDirData
02433     QStringList dataList;
02434     dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirInfo(treeItem);
02435     if (dataList.at(0)=="-1")
02436         return;
02437 
02438     IconSettings *iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(TRUE, dataList.at(0), dataList.at(1), dataList.at(6), "", dataList.at(2));
02439     if (iconAddWizard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted){
02440         // Updating icons view
02441         twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02442     }
02443 
02444     return;
02445 }

02488 
02489 void MainWindow::iconMount_Click(void){
02490     /*
02491         This function request mount of image from icon settings
02492     */
02493 
02494     QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
02495     QSqlQuery query;
02496 
02497     if (!dataList.at(2).isEmpty()){
02498         query.prepare("SELECT image, mount FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id and name=:name");
02499         query.bindValue(":dir_id", dataList.at(2));
02500     } else {
02501         query.prepare("SELECT image, mount FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL and name=:name");
02502     }
02503 
02504     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
02505     query.bindValue(":name", lstIcons->currentItem()->text());
02506     query.exec();
02507     query.first();
02508 
02509     if (query.value(0).toString().isEmpty()){
02510         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("It seems no image file was set in icon options.<br>You might need to set it manualy."));
02511         return;
02512     }
02513 
02514     if (query.value(1).toString().isEmpty()){
02515         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("It seems no mount point was set in icon options.<br>You might need to set it manualy."));
02516         return;
02517     }
02518 
02519     CoreFunction_ImageMount(query.value(0).toString(), query.value(1).toString());
02520 
02521     return;
02522 }
02523 
02524 void MainWindow::iconCut_Click(void){
02525     /*
02526         This function fill iconBuffer with selected icons names
02527         and sets other informations required for copy\cut
02528 
02529         see struct iconCopyBuffer definition for details
02530     */
02531 
02532     QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList;
02533 
02534     // If icon cutted -- set icon disabled style
02535     // FIXME: It pice works fine, but we nead to usse pixmaps for grayscale, not Qt::ItemIsEnabled flag....
02536     // FIXME: It is optional, i don't work on it until release... ;)
02537     //icoList2 = lstIcons->findItems("*", Qt::MatchWrap | Qt::MatchWildcard);
02538 
02539     //  for (int i=0; i<icoList2.count(); i++){
02540     //      icoList2.at(i)->icon()->addPixmap(QPixmap.alphaChannel (), 0, 0);
02541     //  }
02542 
02543     icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02544 
02545     // Clearing icon buffer
02546     iconBuffer.names.clear();
02547     iconBuffer.dir_id="";
02548     iconBuffer.prefix_id="";
02549     iconBuffer.move=false;
02550 
02551     // Fiffing buffer with new items
02552     for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02553         iconBuffer.names.append(icoList.at(i)->text());
02554         //icoList.at(i)->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
02555     }
02556 
02557     // Getting dir_id and prefix_id
02558     QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
02559 
02560     iconBuffer.prefix_id=dataList.at(0);
02561     iconBuffer.dir_id=dataList.at(2);
02562     iconBuffer.move=true;
02563 
02564     return;
02565 }

02567 void MainWindow::iconCopy_Click(void){
02568     /*
02569     This function fill iconBuffer with selected icons names
02570     and sets other informations required for copy\cut
02571 
02572     see struct iconCopyBuffer definition for details
02573     */
02574 
02575     QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
02576 
02577     // Clearing icon buffer
02578     iconBuffer.names.clear();
02579     iconBuffer.dir_id="";
02580     iconBuffer.prefix_id="";
02581     iconBuffer.move=false;
02582 
02583     // Fiffing buffer with new items
02584     for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
02585         iconBuffer.names.append(icoList.at(i)->text());
02586     }
02587 
02588     // Getting dir_id and prefix_id
02589     QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
02590 
02591     iconBuffer.prefix_id=dataList.at(0);
02592     iconBuffer.dir_id=dataList.at(2);
02593     iconBuffer.move=false;
02594 
02595     return;
02596 }
