02598 void MainWindow::iconPaste_Click(void){
02599 
02600 
02601 
02602     QSqlQuery query;
02603     QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
02604 
02605     if (dataList.at(0)==iconBuffer.prefix_id and dataList.at(2)==iconBuffer.dir_id){
02606         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry. Cannot copy or move in to the same file"));
02607         return;
02608     }
02609 
02610     bool fexists=FALSE, ok;
02611     QString newName;
02612 
02613     if (iconBuffer.names.count()>0)
02614         switch (iconBuffer.move){
02615             case true:
02616                 //Cut & Paste section
02617                 for (int i=0; i<iconBuffer.names.count(); i++){
02618 
02619 
02620                     // Checking for not unic names
02621                     newName = iconBuffer.names.at(i);
02622                     fexists=FALSE;
02623                     ok=FALSE;
02624                     fexists = SQL_isIconExistsByName(dataList.at(0), dataList.at(2), iconBuffer.names.at(i));
02625 
02626                     while (fexists){
02627                         newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists."),
02628                                 tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel paste operation."), QLineEdit::Normal,
02629                                     iconBuffer.names.at(i) , &ok);
02630 
02631                         if (!ok){
02632                             return;
02633                         }
02634 
02635                             fexists = SQL_isIconExistsByName(dataList.at(0), dataList.at(2), newName);
02636                     }
02637 
02638                     // uPDATING RECCORD
02639                     if (!iconBuffer.dir_id.isEmpty()){
02640                         query.prepare("UPDATE icon SET name=:newName, prefix_id=:prefix_id, dir_id=:dir_id WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:old_prefix_id and dir_id=:old_dir_id");
02641                         query.bindValue(":old_dir_id", iconBuffer.dir_id);
02642                     } else {
02643                         query.prepare("UPDATE icon SET name=:newName, prefix_id=:prefix_id, dir_id=:dir_id WHERE name=:name and prefix_id=:old_prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
02644                     }
02645 
02646                     query.bindValue(":newName", newName);
02647                     query.bindValue(":name", iconBuffer.names.at(i));
02648                     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
02649 
02650                     if(dataList.at(2).isEmpty())
02651                         query.bindValue(":dir_id", QVariant(QVariant::String));
02652                     else
02653                         query.bindValue(":dir_id", dataList.at(2));
02654 
02655                     query.bindValue(":old_prefix_id", iconBuffer.prefix_id);
02656 
02657                     if (!query.exec()){
02658                         #ifdef DEBUG
02659                             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02660                         #endif
02661                         return;
02662                     }
02663                     query.clear();
02664                 }
02665 
02666                 // Clearing icon buffer
02667                 iconBuffer.names.clear();
02668                 iconBuffer.dir_id="";
02669                 iconBuffer.prefix_id="";
02670                 iconBuffer.move=false;
02671             break;
02672             case false:
02673 
02674                 //Copy & Paste section
02675                 for (int i=0; i<iconBuffer.names.count(); i++){
02676 
02677                                         // Checking for not unic names
02678                     newName = iconBuffer.names.at(i);
02679                     fexists=FALSE;
02680                     ok=FALSE;
02681                     fexists = SQL_isIconExistsByName(dataList.at(0), dataList.at(2), iconBuffer.names.at(i));
02682 
02683                     while (fexists){
02684                         newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists."),
02685                                 tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel paste operation."), QLineEdit::Normal,
02686                                     iconBuffer.names.at(i) , &ok);
02687 
02688                         if (!ok){
02689                             return;
02690                         }
02691 
02692                         fexists = SQL_isIconExistsByName(dataList.at(0), dataList.at(2), newName);
02693                     }
02694 
02695 
02696 
02697                     if (!iconBuffer.dir_id.isEmpty()){
02698                         query.prepare("SELECT name, exec, cmdargs, icon_path, desc, display, winedebug, useconsole, override, wrkdir, nice, desktop FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id and name=:name");
02699                         query.bindValue(":dir_id", iconBuffer.dir_id);
02700                     } else {
02701                         query.prepare("SELECT name, exec, cmdargs, icon_path, desc, display, winedebug, useconsole, override, wrkdir, nice, desktop FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL and name=:name");
02702                     }
02703                     query.bindValue(":name", iconBuffer.names.at(i));
02704                     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", iconBuffer.prefix_id);
02705                     if (!query.exec()){
02706 
02707                             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02708 
02709                     /*  return;
02710                     }
02711 
02712                     if (!query.isValid()){
02713                     */
02714                         // If query fails, exit and
02715                         // Clearing icon buffer
02716                         iconBuffer.names.clear();
02717                         iconBuffer.dir_id="";
02718                         iconBuffer.prefix_id="";
02719                         iconBuffer.move=false;
02720 
02721                         qDebug()<<"Exiting...."<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02722                         return;
02723                     }
02724 
02725 
02726 
02727 
02728                     query.first();
02729 
02730                     QStringList reccordBuffer;
02731 
02732                     for (int j=0; j<=11; j++){
02733                         reccordBuffer<<query.value(j).toString();
02734                     }
02735 
02736                     query.clear();
02737 
02738                     query.prepare("INSERT INTO icon(name, exec, cmdargs, icon_path, desc, display, winedebug, useconsole, override, prefix_id, dir_id, id, wrkdir, nice, desktop) VALUES(:name, :exec, :cmdargs, :icon_path, :desc, :display, :winedebug, :useconsole, :override, :prefix_id, :dir_id, NULL, :wrkdir, :nice, :desktop)");
02739 
02740                     if(dataList.at(2).isEmpty())
02741                         query.bindValue(":dir_id", QVariant(QVariant::String));
02742                     else
02743                         query.bindValue(":dir_id", dataList.at(2));
02744 
02745                     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
02746                     query.bindValue(":name", newName);
02747                     query.bindValue(":exec", reccordBuffer.at(1));
02748                     query.bindValue(":cmdargs", reccordBuffer.at(2));
02749                     query.bindValue(":icon_path", reccordBuffer.at(3));
02750                     query.bindValue(":desc", reccordBuffer.at(4));
02751                     query.bindValue(":display", reccordBuffer.at(5));
02752                     query.bindValue(":winedebug", reccordBuffer.at(6));
02753                     query.bindValue(":useconsole", reccordBuffer.at(7));
02754                     query.bindValue(":override", reccordBuffer.at(8));
02755                     query.bindValue(":wrkdir", reccordBuffer.at(9));
02756                     query.bindValue(":nice", reccordBuffer.at(10));
02757                     query.bindValue(":desktop", reccordBuffer.at(11));
02758 
02759                     if (!query.exec()){
02760                             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02761                         return;
02762                     }
02763 
02764                     query.clear();
02765                 }
02766             break;
02767         }
02768 
02769         twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
02770     return;
02771 }
02772 
02773 void MainWindow::iconOption_Click(void){
02774     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02775     QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
02776     QSqlQuery query;
02777 
02778     QString prefix_id, dir_id, prefix_dir;
02779 
02780     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02781     iconItem = lstIcons->currentItem();
02782 
02783     if (!treeItem)
02784         return;
02785 
02786     if (!iconItem)
02787         return;
02788 
02789     // We gona get prefix_id and dir_id by calling SQL_getPrefixAndDirData
02790     QStringList dataList;
02791     dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(treeItem);
02792     if (dataList.at(0)=="-1"){
02793         return;
02794     } else {
02795         prefix_id = dataList.at(0);
02796         prefix_dir = dataList.at(1);
02797         dir_id = dataList.at(2);
02798     }
02799 
02800     IconSettings *iconAddWizard = new IconSettings(FALSE, prefix_id, prefix_dir, dir_id, iconItem->text());
02801     if (iconAddWizard->exec() == QDialog::Accepted){
02802         // Updating icons view
02803         twPrograms_ItemClick(treeItem, 0);
02804     }
02805 
02806     return;
02807 }
02808 
02809 void MainWindow::dirAdd_Click(void){
02810     QSqlQuery query;
02811     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02812     QTreeWidgetItem *prefixItem;
02813     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02814     QString prefix_id;
02815 
02816     if (!treeItem->text(0).isEmpty()){
02817         bool ok;
02818         QString dirname = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new directory name"), tr("Directory name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, "" , &ok);
02819 
02820         if (ok && !dirname.isEmpty()){
02821 
02822             QStringList getData;
02823             if (treeItem->parent()){
02824                 getData = SQL_getDirctoryInfo(treeItem->parent()->text(0), dirname);
02825                 if (getData.at(0)=="-1")
02826                     return;
02827                 prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeItem->parent());
02828             } else {
02829                 getData = SQL_getDirctoryInfo(treeItem->text(0), dirname);
02830                 if (getData.at(0)=="-1")
02831                     return;
02832                 prefixItem = new QTreeWidgetItem(treeItem);
02833             }
02834 
02835             prefixItem->setText(0, dirname);
02836             prefixItem->setIcon(0, CoreFunction_IconLoad("data/folder.png"));
02837 
02838             query.prepare("INSERT INTO dir(id, name, prefix_id) VALUES(NULL, :name, :prefix_id)");
02839             query.bindValue(":name", dirname);
02840             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", getData.at(0));
02841             query.exec();
02842             query.clear();
02843 
02844         }
02845     }
02846     return;
02847 }

02849 void MainWindow::dirUnmount_Click(void){
02850     /*
02851         Request for unmounting cdrom drve described at wine prefix settings
02852     */
02853 
02854     QStringList dataList = SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(twPrograms->currentItem());
02855     QSqlQuery query;
02856 
02857     query.prepare("select cdrom_mount from prefix where id=:id");
02858     query.bindValue(":id", dataList.at(0));
02859     if (!query.exec()){
02860         #ifdef DEBUG
02861             qDebug()<<"WARNING: contextDirMountDrive\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02862         #endif
02863         return;
02864     }
02865 
02866     query.first();
02867     CoreFunction_ImageUnmount(query.value(0).toString());
02868     query.clear();
02869 
02870     return;
02871 }

02883     if (!query.exec()){
02884         qDebug()<<"WARNING: contextDirMountDrive\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
02885         return;
02886     }
02887 
02888     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
02889       QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO or NRG Image file"), HOME_PATH, tr("iso and nrg files (*.iso *.nrg)"));
02890     #endif
02891 
02892     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
02893       QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO Image file"), HOME_PATH, tr("iso files (*.iso)"));
02894     #endif
02895 
02896     if(fileName.isEmpty()){
02897         return;
02898     }
02899 
02900 
02901     query.first();
02902     CoreFunction_ImageMount(fileName, query.value(0).toString());
02903     query.clear();
02904 
02905     return;
02906 }

02929 void MainWindow::dirRename_Click(void){
02930     QSqlQuery query;
02931     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02932     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02933     QString prefix_id;
02934 
02935     if (treeItem->parent()){
02936         bool ok;
02937         QString dirname = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Enter new name for directory"), tr("Directory name:"), QLineEdit::Normal, treeItem->text(0) , &ok);
02938         if (ok && !dirname.isEmpty() && dirname!=treeItem->text(0)){
02939             query.prepare("select id from prefix where name=:name");
02940             query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02941             query.exec();
02942             query.first();
02943             prefix_id=query.value(0).toString();
02944             query.clear();
02945 
02946             query.prepare("UPDATE dir SET name=:name WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and name=:oldname");
02947             query.bindValue(":name", dirname);
02948             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02949             query.bindValue(":oldname", treeItem->text(0));
02950             query.exec();
02951             query.clear();
02952 
02953             treeItem->setText(0, dirname);
02954         }
02955     }
02956     return;
02957 }
02958 
02959 void MainWindow::dirDelete_Click(void){
02960     QSqlQuery query;
02961     QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem;
02962     treeItem = twPrograms->currentItem();
02963     QString prefix_id, dir_id;
02964 
02965     if (treeItem->parent()){
02966 
02967         if (QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Q4Wine"), tr("Do you really wish delete folder named \"%1\" and all associated icons?\n").arg(twPrograms->currentItem()->text(0)),
02968              QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No)==QMessageBox::Yes){
02969 
02970             query.prepare("select id from prefix where name=:name");
02971             query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
02972             query.exec();
02973             query.first();
02974             prefix_id=query.value(0).toString();
02975             query.clear();
02976 
02977             query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
02978             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02979             query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02980             query.exec();
02981             query.first();
02982             dir_id=query.value(0).toString();
02983             query.clear();
02984 
02985             query.prepare("DELETE FROM icon WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
02986             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02987             query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
02988             query.exec();
02989             query.clear();
02990 
02991             query.prepare("DELETE FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and name=:name");
02992             query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
02993             query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
02994             query.exec();
02995             query.clear();
02996 
02997             treeItem->parent()->removeChild (treeItem);
02998 
02999             twPrograms_ItemClick(twPrograms->currentItem(), 0);
03000         }
03001     }
03002 
03003     return;
03004 }

03006 /**************************************\
03007 |           Embeded SQL functions       |
03008 \**************************************/
03009 
03010 QStringList MainWindow::SQL_getDirctoryInfo(QString prefix_name, QString dirname){
03011 
03012     QSqlQuery query;
03013     QStringList dataList;
03014     query.prepare("select id from prefix where name=:name");
03015     query.bindValue(":name", prefix_name);
03016     query.exec();
03017     query.first();
03018     dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03019     query.clear();
03020 
03021     query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
03022     query.bindValue(":name", dirname);
03023     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
03024     query.exec();
03025     query.first();
03026 
03027     if (query.isValid ()){
03028         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but prefix already have directory named %1.").arg(dirname));
03029         query.clear();
03030         return QStringList ("-1");
03031     }
03032     query.clear();
03033 
03034     return dataList;
03035 
03036 }
03037 
03038 QStringList MainWindow::SQL_getPrefixAndDirInfo(QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem){
03039     /*
03040     This function, gets prefix_id and dir_id info
03041     This pice of code repeats some times, so i decided to place it in embeded function
03042 
03043     @treeItem -- this is start item for discovery...
03044 
03045     It returns QStringList size of some elements;
03046 
03047     0 : prefix_id
03048     1 : prefix_path
03049     2 : wine_dllpath
03050     3 : wine_loader
03051     4 : wine_server
03052     5 : wine_exec
03053     6 : dir_id
03054 
03055     Or 0 : '-1' at error;
03056     */
03057 
03058     QSqlQuery query;
03059     QStringList dataList;
03060 
03061     if (treeItem->parent()){
03062         query.prepare("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec from prefix where name=:name");
03063         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
03064         if (!query.exec()){
03065 #ifdef DEBUG
03066             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03067 #endif
03068             dataList    << "-1";
03069             return dataList;
03070         }
03071         query.first();
03072         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03073         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
03074         dataList << query.value(2).toString();
03075         dataList << query.value(3).toString();
03076         dataList << query.value(4).toString();
03077         dataList << query.value(5).toString();
03078         query.clear();
03079 
03080         query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
03081         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
03082         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
03083         if (!query.exec()){
03084 #ifdef DEBUG
03085             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03086 #endif
03087             return dataList;
03088         }
03089         query.first();
03090         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03091         query.clear();
03092     } else {
03093         query.prepare("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec from prefix where name=:name");
03094         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
03095         if (!query.exec()){
03096 #ifdef DEBUG
03097             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03098 #endif
03099             dataList    << "-1";
03100             return dataList;
03101         }
03102         query.first();
03103         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03104         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
03105         dataList << query.value(2).toString();
03106         dataList << query.value(3).toString();
03107         dataList << query.value(4).toString();
03108         dataList << query.value(5).toString();
03109         dataList << "";
03110         query.clear();
03111     }
03112 
03113     return dataList;
03114 }
03115 
03116 QStringList MainWindow::SQL_getPrefixAndDirData(QTreeWidgetItem *treeItem){
03117     /*
03118         This function, gets prefix_id and dir_id
03119         This pice of code repeats some times, so i decided to place it in embeded function
03120 
03121         @treeItem -- this is start item for discovery...
03122 
03123         It returns QStringList size of 3 elements;
03124 
03125             first : prefix_id
03126             second: prefix_path
03127             third : dir_id
03128 
03129         Or '-1','','-1' at error;
03130     */
03131 
03132     QSqlQuery query;
03133     QStringList dataList;
03134 
03135     if (treeItem->parent()){
03136         query.prepare("select id, path from prefix where name=:name");
03137         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->parent()->text(0));
03138         if (!query.exec()){
03139             #ifdef DEBUG
03140                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03141             #endif
03142             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
03143             return dataList;
03144         }
03145         query.first();
03146         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03147         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
03148         query.clear();
03149 
03150         query.prepare("select id from dir where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id");
03151         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
03152         query.bindValue(":prefix_id", dataList.at(0));
03153         if (!query.exec()){
03154             #ifdef DEBUG
03155                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03156             #endif
03157             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
03158             return dataList;
03159         }
03160         query.first();
03161         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03162         query.clear();
03163     } else {
03164         query.prepare("select id, path from prefix where name=:name");
03165         query.bindValue(":name", treeItem->text(0));
03166         if (!query.exec()){
03167             #ifdef DEBUG
03168                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03169             #endif
03170             dataList    << "-1" << "" << "-1";
03171             return dataList;
03172         }
03173         query.first();
03174         dataList << query.value(0).toString();
03175         dataList << query.value(1).toString();
03176         dataList << "";
03177         query.clear();
03178     }
03179 
03180     return dataList;
03181 }
03182 
03183 bool MainWindow::SQL_isIconExistsByName(QString prefix_id, QString dir_id, QString name){
03184     QSqlQuery query;
03185 
03186     if(dir_id.isEmpty()){
03187         query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id ISNULL");
03188     }else{
03189         query.prepare("select id from icon where name=:name and prefix_id=:prefix_id and dir_id=:dir_id");
03190         query.bindValue(":dir_id", dir_id);
03191     }
03192     query.bindValue(":name", name);
03193     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
03194 
03195     if (!query.exec()){
03196         #ifdef DEBUG
03197             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::iconPaste_Click(void)\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
03198         #endif
03199         return FALSE;
03200     }
03201     query.first();
03202 
03203     if (query.isValid ()){
03204         query.clear();
03205         return TRUE;
03206     }
03207     query.clear();
03208 
03209     return FALSE;
03210 }
03211 
03212 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ImageMount(QString image, QString mount){
03213     /*
03214         Mounting an image or drive to mountmount
03215             @image -- an image (or drive) name
03216             @mount -- mount point
03217     */
03218 
03219 
03220     //mount_cd9660
03221 
03222     QStringList args;
03223     QString arg;
03224 
03225     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
03226 
03227 
03228         if ((image.right(3)=="iso") or (image.right(3)=="nrg")){
03229             args << SH_BIN;
03230             args << "-c";
03231                 arg = core->getWhichOut("mount_cd9660");
03232                 //FIXME: not tested
03233                 //if (image.right(3)=="nrg")
03234                 //  arg = arg.append(" -s 307200 ");
03235                 arg.append("  /dev/`mdconfig -f ");
03236                 arg.append(image);
03237                 arg.append("` ");
03238                 arg.append(mount);
03239             args << arg;
03240         } else {
03241             args << MOUNT_BIN << "-t" << "cd9660" << image << mount;
03242         }
03243     #endif
03244 
03245     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
03246         args << MOUNT_BIN;
03247         args << image;
03248         args << mount;
03249 
03250         if (image.right(3)=="iso"){
03251             args << "-o" << "loop";
03252         }
03253         if (image.right(3)=="nrg"){
03254             args << "-o" << "loop,offset=307200";
03255         }
03256 
03257     #endif
03258 
03259         //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
03260         if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
03261            arg=args.join(" ");
03262            args.clear();
03263            args<<arg;
03264         }
03265 
03266         Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Mounting..."), tr("Mounting..."));
03267 
03268         if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
03269             statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Image successfully mounted"));
03270         } else {
03271             statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Image mount fail"));
03272         }
03273 
03274     return;
03275 }
03276 
03277 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_ImageUnmount(QString mount){
03278 
03279     QStringList args;
03280     QString arg;
03281     Process *exportProcess;
03282 
03283     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
03284         args.clear();
03285         args << "-c" << tr("%1 | grep %2").arg(MOUNT_BIN).arg(mount);
03286 
03287         QProcess *myProcess = new QProcess(this);
03288         myProcess->start(SH_BIN, args);
03289         if (!myProcess->waitForFinished()){
03290             qDebug() << "Make failed:" << myProcess->errorString();
03291             return;
03292         }
03293 
03294         QString devid = myProcess->readAll();
03295     #endif
03296 
03297     args.clear();
03298     args << UMOUNT_BIN;
03299     args << mount;
03300 
03301     //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
03302     if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
03303        arg=args.join(" ");
03304        args.clear();
03305        args<<arg;
03306     }
03307 
03308     exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Unmounting..."), tr("Unmounting..."));
03309 
03310     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
03311         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("image successfully unmounted"));
03312     } else {
03313         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("image unmount fail"));
03314     }
03315 
03316     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
03317         if (!devid.isEmpty()){
03318             devid = devid.split(" ").first();
03319             if (!devid.isEmpty()){
03320                 if (devid.contains("md")){
03321                     args.clear();
03322                     args << "mdconfig" <<  "-d" << tr("-u%1").arg(devid.mid(7));
03323 
03324                     //Fix args for kdesu\gksu\e.t.c.
03325                     if (!GUI_SUDO_BIN.contains(QRegExp("/sudo$"))){
03326                        arg=args.join(" ");
03327                        args.clear();
03328                        args<<arg;
03329                     }
03330 
03331                     exportProcess = new Process(args, GUI_SUDO_BIN, HOME_PATH, tr("Unmounting..."), tr("running mdconfig"));
03332 
03333                     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
03334                         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("mdimage removed"));
03335                     } else {
03336                         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("mdimage remove fail"));
03337                     }
03338                 }
03339             }
03340         }
03341     #endif
03342 
03343     return;
03344 }
03345 
03346 void MainWindow::CoreFunction_WineRunAutorunItems(void){
03347 
03348     QSqlQuery query, icoQuery;
03349     QString execcmd, prefixid, runcmd, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir, envargs;
03350 
03351     query.exec("select id, path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_exec, wine_server from prefix");
03352 
03353     while(query.next()){
03354         icoQuery.prepare("SELECT exec, prefix_id, useconsole, cmdargs, override, winedebug, display, wrkdir FROM icon WHERE dir_id=(SELECT id FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id and name=:name)");
03355 
03356         icoQuery.bindValue(":prefix_id", query.value(0).toString());
03357         icoQuery.bindValue(":name", "autostart");
03358 
03359         if (!icoQuery.exec()){
03360             #ifdef DEBUG
03361                 qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL_getPrefixAndDirData\nINFO:\n"<<icoQuery.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<icoQuery.lastError();
03362             #endif
03363             return;
03364         }
03365 
03366         while (icoQuery.next()){
03367             ExecObject execObj;
03368 
03369             execObj.execcmd = icoQuery.value(0).toString();
03370             execObj.prefixid = icoQuery.value(1).toString();
03371             execObj.useconsole = icoQuery.value(2).toString();
03372             execObj.cmdargs = icoQuery.value(3).toString();
03373             execObj.override = icoQuery.value(4).toString();
03374             execObj.winedebug = icoQuery.value(5).toString();
03375             execObj.display = icoQuery.value(6).toString();
03376             execObj.wrkdir = icoQuery.value(7).toString();
03377 
03378             CoreFunction_WinePrepareRunParams(execObj);
03379 
03380         }
03381 
03382         icoQuery.clear();
03383 
03384     }
03385 
03386     query.clear();
03387 
03388     return;
03389 }
